Ayman Cherkaoui bụ onye ọka iwu nke mba ụwa na iwu mgbanwe ihu igwe, onye isi nchịkwa nke United Nations Global Compact na Morocco, na onye ndụmọdụ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe nke dị na Centre for International Sustainable Development Law na Montreal Quebec, Canada. Cherkaoui na Afọ 2017 ka, akpọrọ aha na nke a na akpọ Emerging Leaders Program na Policy Centre for the New South, na afọ 2018 ka akpọrọ ya aha na Obama Foundation Leaders: Afrịka Program.
Cherkaoui gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Montreal na-enweta Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering na Mahadum McGill, na Bachelor of Laws na Mahadim nke Montreal Faculty of Law
Cherkaoui mechara nweta Master nke Science site na EMLYON Business School na Lyon, France
Na mgbakwunye, Cherkaoui emechaala asambodo Adaptation na Mahadum Oxford, na asambodo njikwa nkwado azụmahịa na Mahadum Cambridge.

Cherkaoui jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche maka Mgbanwe ihu igwe na Mkparịta ụka nye Minista nke Gburugburu Ebe Obibi, Morocco, onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ oke na UNFCCC COP22 Presidency, yana dị ka ọkachamara na Mgbanwe ihu ọha na Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ)
Na mbụ, Cherkaoui rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka VALYANS Consulting, International Air Transport Association, na Air Liquide.
Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na mkparịta ụka teknụzụ n'okpuru UNFCCC na ihe ọhụrụ iwu iji kwado mgbanwe na ibelata mba ndị nwere nsogbu ihu igwe.
Cherkaoui nyere aka n'ọtụtụ edemede ndị ọkà mmụta a na akpọ akụkọ teknụzụ.
